cello.alt.util
Class ScriptableWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject
      cello.alt.util.ScriptableWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.mozilla.javascript.debug.DebuggableObject, org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable
public class ScriptableWrapper
extends org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject

Provides a pseudo-class wrapper for JavaScript. This allows users in JavaScript to construct classes with dynamic get and put methods (that is, variable assignment and retrieval can be proxied through functions).

Author:
Marcello
See Also:

Method Detail

init

public static void init(org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable scope)
Initializes a particular context and scope with the ScriptableWrapper pseudo-class.

Parameters:
scope - the scope

construct

public static ScriptableWrapper construct(org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable objectToWrap,
                                          java.lang.Object getFunction,
                                          java.lang.Object putFunction)
The JavaScript constructor for the ScriptableWrapper pseudo-class. JavaScript function "evaluate". In order to access the current JavaScript scope and Context, this static form needs to be used.
  • new ScriptableWrapper(objectToWrap)
  • new ScriptableWrapper(objectToWrap,getFunction,putFunction)
getFunction/putFunction can either be a string (name of a property in objectToWrap) or an actual function.

Parameters:
objectToWrap -
getFunction - a String or Function
putFunction - a String or Function
Returns:
the constructed object

public static ScriptableWrapper jsConstructor(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx,
                                              java.lang.Object[] args,
                                              org.mozilla.javascript.Function ctorObj,
                                              boolean inNewExpr)
The JavaScript constructor for the ScriptableWrapper pseudo-class.

Parameters:
cx - javascript Context
args - the arguments passed to this constructor
ctorObj - the constructor object
inNewExpr - whether or not this constructor is called in a new expr?
Returns:
the constructed object
